00001 #include "TString.h"
00002 #include "TFile.h"
00003 #include "TH1D.h"
00004 #include "TH2F.h"
00005 #include "TSpectrum.h"
00006 #include "TLine.h"
00007 #include "TBox.h"
00008 
00009 #include <vector>
00010 
00011 double xraycount(int runlow, int runhigh, bool draw = false) {
00012 
00013   // What we'll be using
00014   char fname[256];
00015   int nMuons = 0;
00016   double tVals[] = { -500., 500. };
00017   double aVals[] = { 2820., 2860. };
00018   TH1D* pyGeAmp = NULL;
00019 
00020   // Collect all the histograms of Ge-S heights
00021   // (pile-up protected and within 500ns of a muon hit on either side)
00022   for (int r = runlow; r <= runhigh; ++r) {
00023     sprintf(fname, "/net/abner/data/RunPSI2013/hist/his%05d.root", r);
00024     TFile fGe(fname, "READ");
00025     TH2F* hGeTDiffAmp = (TH2F*)fGe.Get("hMuSC_Ge-S_AmplitudeVsTdiff_PP");
00026     TH1D* hMuSCCount = (TH1D*)fGe.Get("muSC_count_raw");
00027     nMuons += hMuSCCount->GetBinContent(2);
00028     static int tBinLow = hGeTDiffAmp->GetXaxis()->FindBin(tVals[0]);
00029     static int tBinHigh = hGeTDiffAmp->GetXaxis()->FindBin(tVals[1]);
00030     if (pyGeAmp == NULL) {
00031       pyGeAmp = (TH1D*)hGeTDiffAmp->ProjectionY("_py",tBinLow,tBinHigh)->Clone("hGeHeights");
00032       pyGeAmp->SetDirectory(0);
00033     } else {
00034       TH1D* tmp = hGeTDiffAmp->ProjectionY("_py",tBinLow,tBinHigh);
00035       pyGeAmp->Add(tmp);
00036     }
00037     fGe.Close();
00038   }
00039 
00040   TSpectrum s;
00041   TH1* bgGe = s.Background(pyGeAmp);
00042 
00043   int aBinLow    = pyGeAmp->GetXaxis()->FindBin(aVals[0]);
00044   int aBinHigh   = pyGeAmp->GetXaxis()->FindBin(aVals[1]);
00045   double nStops  = pyGeAmp->Integral(aBinLow, aBinHigh);
00046   double rate    = nStops/(double)nMuons;
00047   double bg      = bgGe->Integral(aBinLow, aBinHigh);
00048   double bgsrate = (nStops - bg)/(double)nMuons;
00049   printf("Saw %d stops seen in Ge (with %d background) and %d muons in muSc\n", (int)nStops, (int)bg, nMuons);
00050   printf("Rate:    %g xrays/muons    (%g background subtracted)\n", rate, bgsrate);
00051 
00052   if (draw) {
00053     double geMax = pyGeAmp->GetMaximum();
00054     TLine l1(aVals[0], 0., aVals[0], geMax);
00055     TLine l2(aVals[1], 0., aVals[1], geMax);
00056     TBox b(aVals[0], 0., aVals[1], geMax);
00057     
00058     pyGeAmp->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(0.,geMax);
00059     pyGeAmp->SetStats(0);
00060     bgGe->SetStats(0);
00061     b.SetFillStyle(3004);
00062     b.SetFillColor(kBlue);
00063 
00064     pyGeAmp->DrawClone();
00065     bgGe->DrawClone("SAME");
00066     l1.DrawClone("SAME");
00067     l2.DrawClone("SAME");
00068     b.DrawClone("SAME");
00069   }
00070   
00071 
00072   return rate;
00073 }
